thread.title: Disabilities Can Negatively Impact Supervisor-Subordinate Relationship (Rutgers University)

author: wn.com
title: Disabilities Can Negatively Impact Supervisor-Subordinate Relationship (Rutgers University)
text: ( Source : Rutgers University ) Differences in age, gender, and race can negatively affect the relationship between a supervisor and a subordinate, but so, too, can disabilities, according to a new Rutgers study. Differences in age, gender,
